ace-playbook-generation.description: Auto-generated technical plan documentation for ACE patterns

markdown-technical-specs.description: Markdown-based technical specifications with YAML frontmatter

structured-documentation.description: Standardized documentation structure with frontmatter metadata, summary, context, approach, and success criteria sections

pattern-implementation-framework.description: Systematic framework for applying coding patterns with verification steps

metadata-driven-documentation.description: Use YAML frontmatter to embed machine-readable metadata in documentation files

auto-generated-consistency.description: Generate documentation programmatically to maintain consistency and reduce manual errors

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file paths and descriptions
